Detailed Description

Abstract Particle System.

The particle system provides an abstract way to create, manage, and effect particles. The user creates new particles by overloading PhParticle, adds them to the system by overloading PhEmitter, and controls them using PhEffector.

See also:
PhParticle, PhEffector, PhEmitter

void phoenix::PhParticleSystem::onRender (  )  [virtual]

Render.

Reimplemented from phoenix::PhSceneNode.

void phoenix::PhParticleSystem::onPostRender (  )  [virtual]

Post render.

Calls the step() function for every emitter then every effector.

See also:
onPreRender, onRender, PhEffector::step(), PhEmitter::step()

Reimplemented from phoenix::PhSceneNode.
